description: Developed and maintained WordPress websites using HTML, CSS, Javascript, Elementor and ACF for custom post types, ensuring desktop to mobile responsiveness.
Created email templates with strict HTML and CSS compatibility for cross-client rendering.
Customize website functionalities with JavaScript and PHP, ensuring smooth user interactions.
Maintain WooCommerce integrations, writing custom PHP scripts as needed.
Integrate custom API for user needs for the WordPress websites.
Translated mockups into pixel-perfect websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AngularJS, jQuery, and Vue 3.
Delivered BAU (Business As Usual) tickets on time, ensuring client satisfaction.
Collaborated with web designers and QA teams to improve UI/UX while enhancing cross-browser compatibility and website accessibility.
One of the main developers involved in upgrading the company website to Vue 3, implementing modular and reusable components.
Integrate payment methods on websites with custom-made internal APIs and validations.
Assisted in integrating HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP for company projects.
Worked in a team of interns to deliver client-requested features under senior developer guidance.
Presented project solutions and received feedback from senior developers.
